<template>
  <form class="form" id="task-form">
    <input
      type="text"
      class="input"
      placeholder="Введите название"
      id="task-input"
      required
      v-model="taskName"
    />
    <button @click="onSubmit" type="submit" class="form__btn">Добавить</button>
    <button @click="closeForm" type="submit" class="form__btn">Отмена</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "AddTaskForm",
  props: {
    taskName: {
      type: String,
      require: true,
    },
  },
  setup() {},
};
</script>

<style scoped></style>
